entry.title: Celebrate CROWN Day with Gracie's Corner! #shorts #crownday

media:group.media:title: Celebrate CROWN Day with Gracie's Corner! #shorts #crownday
media:group.media:description:
Today is #CROWNDay, a day dedicated to celebrating the rich heritage and beauty of natural hair. We proudly wear our crowns high, signifying our right to self-expression and individuality.
This day also serves as a powerful reminder of the ongoing fight against race-based hair discrimination. By joining the conversation and showing your #CROWNLove, you contribute to creating a more inclusive and respectful world where everyone feels confident rocking their natural hairstyles, free from prejudice, in workplaces, schools, and all areas of life.
Let's celebrate our unique crowns and advocate for a world that embraces them all!
#DOVEPARTNER #CROWNLove, #CROWNProud, #TheCROWNAct, #PasstheCROWN, #CROWNMovement

Be Honest is an original Gracie's Corner song that encourage kids to tell the truth. Come join Gracie and friends as they learn about the importance of practicing good morals in this educational kids song.
For free learning activities and Gracie's Corner merch, visit www.GraciesCornerTV.com. Songs are available on all music streaming platforms.
Lyrics: Be honest Be honest Be honest Always be honest and tell the truth I‚Äôll be honest and tell the truth (I‚Äôll tell the truth) I‚Äôll be honest and tell the truth I know sometimes it is hard to do But please be honest and tell the truth I‚Äôll be honest and tell the truth (I‚Äôll tell the truth) Yes, I‚Äôll tell the truth Because it is the right thing to do (Be honest) I‚Äôll tell the truth everyday This is how you can trust what I say (Be honest) Hey, we all make mistakes Like having big spills Or causing something to break (Be honest) It‚Äôs not always easy to do But be brave, be honest Tell others the truth I‚Äôll be honest and tell the truth (I‚Äôll tell the truth) I‚Äôll be honest and tell the truth I know sometimes it is hard to do But please be honest and tell the truth I‚Äôll be honest and tell the truth (I‚Äôll tell the truth) Be honest And tell the truth Be honest No matter what you do Be honest (Don‚Äôt forget) Always be honest and tell the truth Be honest And tell the truth Be honest No matter what you do Be honest (Don‚Äôt forget) Always be honest and tell the truth I always will (Be honest) I always will (Be honest) Always be honest and tell the truth

Lyrics: Here we go looby loo, Here we go looby light, Here we go looby loo, All on a Saturday night. Here we go looby loo, Here we go looby light, Here we go looby loo, All on a Saturday night. You put your right hand in. Your put your right hand out. You give your hand a shake, shake, shake, And turn yourself about. Here we go looby loo, Here we go looby light, Here we go looby loo, All on a Saturday night. (Let‚Äôs go!) You put your left hand in. You put your left hand out. You give your hand a shake, shake, shake, And turn yourself about. Here we go looby loo, Here we go looby light, Here we go looby loo, All on a Saturday night. (Let‚Äôs go!) You put your right foot in. You put your right foot out. You give your foot a shake, shake, shake, And turn yourself about. Here we go looby loo, Here we go looby light, Here we go looby loo, All on a Saturday night. (Let‚Äôs go!) You put your left foot in. You put your left foot out. You give your foot a shake, shake, shake, And turn yourself about. Here we go looby loo, Here we go looby light, Here we go looby loo, All on a Saturday night. (Let‚Äôs go!) You put your whole self in. You put your whole self out. You give your self a shake, shake, shake, And turn yourself about. Here we go looby loo, Here we go looby light, Here we go looby loo, All on a Saturday night. (Let‚Äôs go!) Now step to the middle And clap your hands Step to the middle And clap your hands. Here we go, here we go Looby loo Show everybody what you can do. Here we go looby loo, Here we go looby light, Here we go looby loo, All on a Saturday night. Here we go looby loo, Here we go looby light, Here we go looby loo, All on a Saturday night. (Let‚Äôs go) Here we go looby loo Show what you can do. Here we go looby light Dance all day and night (Let‚Äôs go) Here we go looby loo Show what you can do.
